com.noctarius.tengi.core.serialization.marshaller

Interface MarshallerFilter


  • public interface MarshallerFilter

    The MarshallerFilter is used to decide if a Marshaller can be used to serialize or de-serialize an object type.

    The result of the accept(Object) method might be cached if MarshallerFilter.Result.AcceptedAndCache is returned but never for other results.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MarshallerFilter.Result
      The Result enum is used as a result returned from a MarshallerFilter to give evaluation information on the tested value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MarshallerFilter.Result accept(Object object)
      This method tests the given object with logic rules to decide if the associated Marshaller is able to serialize and de-serialize this object.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        MarshallerFilter.Result accept(Object object)

        This method tests the given object with logic rules to decide if the associated Marshaller is able to serialize and de-serialize this object.

        If MarshallerFilter.Result.Next is returned the filter does not assume this object to be serializable using the corresponding Marshaller. If MarshallerFilter.Result.Accepted is returned, the corresponding Marshaller will be able to serialize or de-serialize the object but the result won't be cached. If MarshallerFilter.Result.AcceptedAndCache is returned the Marshaller is also able to serialize the object and the result will be cached and no new acceptance test is executed for the same type again.

        Parameters:
        object - the object to be evaluated for serializability using the associated Marshaller
        Returns:
        the test result
